iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
func allSatisfy(_ predicate: (Publishers.Sequence<Elements, Failure>.Output) -> Bool) -> Result<Bool, Failure>.Publisher
```
